backend/main.mo: Actor implementing user profiles, visa records, and per-user application status storage with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark mode theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application into the root container.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component controlling routing, authentication flow, and profile setup gating.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper providing header, footer, and page structure.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying copyright and caffeine.ai attribution with dynamic year.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with navigation, login/logout handling, and authenticated user display.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and submit their profile name.
frontend/src/components/reminders/Remind: UI component for adding, removing, and listing preset or custom reminder timestamps tied to an expiry date.
frontend/src/components/reminders/Upcomi: Fetches upcoming reminders, flattens and sorts them, and displays overdue and upcoming reminders in alerts.
frontend/src/components/status/Applicati: Manages creation, editing, and deletion of application status entries with forms, dialogs, and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/visa/VisaRecordF: Form for creating or editing visa records, including handling expiry dates and reminder configuration.
frontend/src/components/visa/VisaRecordL: Displays all visa records with expiry indicators and provides edit and delete actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHashRoute.ts: Simple hash-based router hook returning the current route and a setter to update window.location.hash.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, and logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, visa records, reminders, and application statuses through an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers and custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AustralianVisaCheckPa: Renders a form for checking an Australian visa application status and displays the result using application status API hooks.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Provides a dashboard with tabs to manage visa records, reminders, and application statuses, including a form for adding or editing records.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays the marketing landing page with a login button and navigation to visa status checking, highlighting app features.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL and hash params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and enabled plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s current state, features, risks, and architectural notes for expanding VisaTrack with a mock visa check module.
